Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 3 Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika
3.2 Saṅkhataduka, Kusalattika
Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika
Saṅkhataduka, Kusalattika
14.
1497Saṅkhataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṅkhato kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ. Sappaccayasadisaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ.)
1498Saṅkhatadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< Paccanīyuddhāraup3.3 Sanidassanaduka, Kusalattika >>
